question: Outline the mechanism for electrophilic substitution in arenes

keypoints.title: Nitration
answer: Nitrite ion production: HNO<sub>3</sub> + H<sub>2</sub>SO<sub>4</sub> --> NO2+ + HSO4- + H2O
At the end: H+ + HSO4- --> H2SO4

keypoints.title: Halogenation
answer: Bromine polarisation: Br2 + FeBr3 --> Br+ + FeBr4-
At the end: H+ + FeBr4- --> FeBr3 + HBr
